name: Thror
response: Insurance is seen as a spare rock—useful but not worth carving one's name into. Pharma, however, is the real deal, something Thror might even break a sweat—or a boulder—to defend. Crypto, on the other hand, is likened to old shoes left by the river—tolerated only because smashing them would take too much effort.
